title: "We Want Infinite All-Star Rosters"
description: The team assesses the MLB All-Star Game and is joined by Travis Sawchik to discuss his new book, The MVP Machine. Plus, a Rabbit Hole on New York ticker-tape parades.
itunes:title: "We Want Infinite All-Star Rosters"
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
